description: Take a Woolworths chocolate mud cake, add two more ingredients and create a batch of decadent truffles. It doesn't get easier than this dessert recipe.
name: Chocolate Mud Cake Truffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place chocolate in a medium microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high for 1 minute, stirring halfway, or until melted. Drizzle chocolate over truffles. Freeze for 5 minutes or until chocolate has set. Serve.
